attributes.action: Exempt all radio licence fees for RNLI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We direct the House to support the RNLI as they have agreed the excellent voluntary work they do without any Government assistance by exempting them from paying radio licence fees for their sole purpose of saving lives at sea.
They should be treated similarly to the police, fire brigade and ambulance services.
